name: FINNAIR A350, BUSINESS CLASS - HELSINKI TO LONDON HEATHROW
description:
Snapchat: pauls_trips

Twitter: @pauls_trips

Business class on the Finnair A350! 

If you’ve browsed my channel uploads then you’ll know the very FIRST video I ever made for YouTube was a trip on Finnair’s A350 on its inaugural flight between Helsinki and London Heathrow.

Finnair occasionally roster this aircraft on the London route because of the demand for cargo space. With such a big business class cabin, reward availability is always good! This flight is unmissable thanks to the fabulous business cabin, featuring a semi-private suite, flat bed and huge windows. This aircraft has definitely been a game changer for Finnair.

Join me for the whole trip – including the Premium Finnair Lounge at Helsinki, boarding, taxi, takeoff, breakfast, cruise and landing at a blustery and cold London Heathrow. 

I absolutely recommend Finland and Helsinki, especially if you can get there by A350 – I hope you enjoy the video!

That other A350 video I made: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ot2GL4oniRs
